title: Web Management Console
content: Admin user can restore all the AOS system to factory setting

title: DevOps
content: Refactor AOS repo, Use a clean tool to remove unwanted git repository. Name convention for the downloadable files. â€¢	Use STAT recommendation to fix vulnerabilities discovered from static code scans.

title: General
content: Migrate From Oracle Java to OpenJDK. Fix issue with AOS for Windows. Enhance the accountservice SOAP service

title: Mobile
content: Fingerprint authentication (iOS & Android). Codeless AI - Modify AOS UI for better Mobile Testing. New Demo Narrative is currently available - http://mf-te.com/2020/03/25/mobile-testing-with-codeless-ai-2/

title: Security
content: Authentication events are now logged, so these can be utilized within a security context for ArcSight ESM, Interset, Logger and others. For CEF format, we will shortly release a Flex Connector, or you can write your own.

title: LRC
content: Deploy a Nimbus docker container, On-premises LG

title: COBOL
content: Design new feature leveraging COBOL, stay tuned for next version

title: ITOM
content: Leverage AOS for monitoring end user inter-container traffic
